entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 4 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
